pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 8, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 8, 2016:

Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and will hold a media availability.

Sault Ste. Marie Bus Barn
111 Huron Street
Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario

Note for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later 9:30 a.m.


Thunder Bay, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and will hold a media availability.

Thunder Bay Bus Barn
570 Fort William Road
Thunder Bay, Ontario

Note for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later 1:00 p.m.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
